r.d: This is the Firebird/Interbase MDB2 driver.
r.n: - implemented listTableTriggers(), listTableViews() and listFunctions() in the Manager module - implemented getTriggerDefinition() in the Reverse module - explicitly set is_manip parameter to false for transaction debug calls - pass parameter array as debug() all with scope "parameters" in every execute() call (bug #4119) - typo fixes in phpdoc (thx Stoyan) - added support for fixed and variable types for 'text' in declarations, as well as in reverse engineering (Request #1523) - made _doQuery() return a reference - added userinfo's to all raiseError calls that previously had none - added 'prepared_statements' supported meta data setting - typo fix ressource/resource in LOB array - added missing unset() to _destroyLOB() - fixed _destroyLOB() API to match other private LOB methods - fixed phpdoc comments of all private LOB methods - added missing supported parameter to prepare() signature - fix default field value in getTableFieldDefinition() [Reverse module]
